wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Mitchell (born 20 April 1907 – 3 December 1971) was an English footballer who played as an outside forward. Born in Coxhoe, County Durham, he played for Ferryhill Athletic, Crook Town, Sunderland, Notts County, Darlington, Manchester United, Hull City, Northampton Town, Rossendale United and Great Harwood.
